Articles.Content:
So i'm scrolling throw the challenges forms and i get this idea that your reading

RULES

1.It must be built, tested and posted w/o any crashes with in 2-3 week's {haven't decided}

2.It must be safe for the Kerbals.

3.It cant be taller than the V.A.B. but, must be able too land on Eeloo, then land on eve, land on Moho, then land on Kerbin.

4.It must be sugsessful with all standered's

5.Have fun

6.It has to use 1! mod and that mod is...Nova Punch remix pack.

The 1st Weeks Challenge:

A probe that can land on all the planets in K.S.P. and cant be Taller than the V.A.B.

Edited July 29, 2013 by pat8996
Bean

Please review the challenge submission guidelines. This one seems to be missing a few key points (such as scoring, having been tested beforehand for feasibility, and giving enough details as to what needs to be done).
Hey skyRender this is my first challenge can you blame me
Actually, you should read the guidelines before posting. They are there for a reason.

Also a week to do this is pretty harsh from a fairly newby perspective, have a look at the stock craft replacement challenge. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/40224-Better-Stock-Crafts
Changed it bean and im not brand new to KSP im just new to the fourms
